concept.title: API
concept.shortdesc: provides API interfaces for you to integrate a third-party software or device.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: API feature is supported on the following S-Series VoIP PBX models:
API feature is supported on Yeastar Cloud PBX v81.4.0.8 or later.
API feature is supported on Yeastar K2 IPPBX v80.2.0.X or later.

section.title: API Guide
section.p: For more information of API, refer to Yeastar Cloud PBX- API guide.
For more information of API, refer to Yeastar S-Series API Guide.
For more information of API, refer to Yeastar K2 API Guide.
In the API guide, we introduces how to enable and configure API on , and provides API references.
